value.title: Visualize Graph Data in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you wondered how to visualize graph data? No, not Microsoft Graph. Graph Networks! Adam shows you how you can do this in Power BI Desktop. value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
